page.title: 14A PIG FARMER
page.content: A TYPICAL MONDAY FOR A PIG FARMER.IT STARTS WHEN YOU GET UP AT 6 O'CLOCK THEN YOU GO OUT AND CHECK IF ANY NEW PIGS HAVE BEEN BORN IN THE NIGHT.6.30 BREAKFAST WHICH CONSISTS OF TOAST AND 3 CUPS OF TEA. 7.00 FEED THE PIGS.8.00 START MUCKNG OUT.THIS CONSISTS OF CLEANING SOW HOUSE,FARROWING HOUSE,WEANER HOUSE AND THE SOWING HOUSE.1.00 LUNCH OF SANDWICH AND TEA. 2.00 COMPLETE THE MUCKING OUT.THEN ANY OF THE FOLLOWING _REMOVE PIGLETS TEETH AND TAILS,GIVE IRON INJECTIONS,CASTRATING,WEANING,SERVING ,MOVING SOWS,WEIGHING PIGS,SEEING REPRESENTATIVES,PREGNANCY TESTING AND FILLING FOOD BARROWS FOR THE NEXT MORNING,WASHING AND DISINFECTING PENS.FINISH AT 7PM FINAL CHECK AT 10.00BED 10.30 _11.00 .
